## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Ecoregionalization workflow tutorial](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/ecology/tutorials/Ecoregionalization_tutorial/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
* Uses [Galaxy Workflow Comments](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/galaxy/workflows_comments.html)
